N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 149-2.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

For purposes of this Subpart: (a) Administrative costs shall mean the costs
of those activities which are incurred to provide direction and oversight for
program implementation including program planning and application, monitoring, data collection, research, evaluation and reporting. (b) Base year shall mean the school year
prior to the current year. (c) Current year means the school year in which the plan prepared pursuant to this

Subpart is to be implemented. (d) Chronic truancy rate shall mean one minus the attendance ratio for the school
year prior to the base year. (e) Local funds shall mean monies raised by local tax levy. (f) Identified students shall mean those
students who: (1)
have been identified
pursuant to section
149-2.3
(b)(3)
of
this Subpart as having a high rate of truancy and academic failure; or
(2)
have been identified as
being: (i) pregnant; (ii)
a parent; or
(iii)
a member of a household that receives
public assistance and who resides in a hotel, motel, shelter or in another
temporary living arrangement. (g) Indirect costs shall mean the costs
associated with program implementation which cannot readily be identified with
the program including payroll preparation, central purchasing and allocation of
classrooms and other operating space. Notes
